text:
254 THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL. DECEMBER 12, 1874.

Uleaborg,—6,824 logs, 2 log ends mahogany, Nottebohn & Co. Sarfsen @ Sheet Harbor,—11,623 deals, 600 deal ends, Order. Vision @ Cronstadt,—3,104 deals, 2 pcs. scantlings, 1,556 deal ends, 4 spars, Order. Charlotte @ Shediac,—12,181 t. deals, 14 knees, 50 boards, Sundry Consignees.
Dec. 8. Lady Clare (s) @ Riga,—9,491 sleepers, 850 ½-sleepers, Order. Louise @ Quebec,—22,165 deals, 458 deal ends, 3,256 staves, M. Young @ Tumbez,—358 logs mahogany, 19 logs mahogany ends, Order. Helene @ Wyborg,—521 pcs. timber, 444 doz. deals, Order.
Dec. 9. Louise Ann Fanny (s) @ Gothenburg,—905 doz. boards, 10 bdls. rickers, Phillipps, Graves, & Co. Sirio @ Cronstadt,—11,944 deals, 1,497 deal ends, Order. Aaron Eaton @ Holmsund,—1,570 doz. deals and battens, 16,301 staves, Order.
Dec. 10. Nordstjernan @ St. Anna,—195 logs mahogany, 7 log ends, Order. Fenna @ S. Christiana,—200 cs. wood pulp, J. A. Reid; 250 cs. wood pulp, Gothenburg Com. Co.; 153 bgs. wood pulp, J. A. Spicer & Co. ; 14,624 boards, G. E. Arnold & Co.; 20,262 boards, J. Anderson; 902 boards, Duus, Brown & Co. ; 10,735 boards, With, Webster, & Co.
There were also imported during the above period, 30,016 pcs. red-wood pulp, 16,647 staves from New York, 1,000 pcs. lathwood from Cronstadt, and 20 t. sapan wood from Manilla.

LIVERPOOL.
Nov. 26. Loanda (s) @ W. C. Africa,—727 pcs. ebony. Anne @ Fredrikstad,—27,906 boards, Order. Esna @ Riga,—7,664 sleepers. Angola (s) @ Benin,—11,060 pcs. barwood, 806 pcs. ebony, Hatton & Co. Holfide @ Uleaborg,—19,262 deals, &c., Order. Emigrant @ Lulea,—22,340 battens, &c.
Nov. 27. Strathearn @ Quebec,—9,908 deals, 12,575 pcs. lumber, Sundry Consignees. Sam King @ St. John, N.B.,—28,918 deals, &c., 3,038 pcs. timbers, C. Martha @ Memel,—521 pcs. timber, 500 deals, 15 fms. lathwood, Order.
Nov. 28. Maria @ Quebec,—697 pcs. timber, 1,485 deals, 500 deal ends, 10,800 staves, Holme & Co.
Nov. 30. William Leavitt @ Rangoon,—160 planks, 20 ventilators, Co. Roberts @ Galas,—305 t. logwood, 52 t. candle wood, 45 t. fustic, 18 t. braziletto, 175 t. ebony, Hall & Co. H. W. Workman @ St. John, N.B.,—27,595 deals, &c., 148 pcs. scantling, 1,734 deal ends, Order.
Dec. 1. Ellida @ Pugwash,—19,065 deals, &c., Wolf & Co. Tre Sorelle @ Rangoon,—39 ventilators, 83 planks, Order. Kermaria @ Rangoon,—30 ventilators, 80 planks, Order. Matilda C. Smith @ Musquash,—19,065 deals, &c., 891 deal ends, Farnworth & Co. Wave Queen @ Londonderry, N.S.,—25,333 deals, 1,522 deal ends, 4,800 palings, Carvill & Son; 21,123 deals, 1,522 deal ends, 11,782 staves, 989 pcs. scantlings, 3,867 deal ends, 2,395 boards, 4,200 palings, Sundry Consignees.
Dec. 2. Elmina (s) @ W. C. Africa,—426 billets camwood, Order; 1,058 billets ebony, 11,550 billets barwood, Irvine & Co. Robert Gedfrey @ Miramichi,—10,479 deals, 8,330 pcs. scantlings, 1,269 deal ends, 9,138 boards, 59,810 palings, Order.
Dec. 3. Johann @ Laguna de Terminos,—115 logs cedar, 77 mahogany crotches, 68 t. logwood, 9½ t. fustic, 7 log ends, Sundry Consignees.
Dec. 4. Ahto @ Tornea,—14,679 deals, &c., Order. Christine @ Azua,—917 pcs. lignum vitæ, 748 pcs. fustic, 363 crotches, 309 logs mahogany, Chaloner & Co. John Pascal @ Bangor, U.S.,—33,812 deals, 3,864 ends, 18,260 palings, A. F. & J. D. Mackay.
Dec. 5. Tinto @ Quebec,—6,609 deals, Order. Zorilla (s) @ Trieste, —15,400 staves. Kronprinsen @ Onega,—22,170 deals, &c., Carter & Co. Ceres @ Riga,—3,950 ½-sleepers, Order, (part of deck-load lost overboard). Pantser @ Wanks River,—303 logs mahogany, &c., 1 t. rosewood, 12 logs mahogany, 20 t. log ends, Order. Anna Magdalena @ Laguna de Terminos,—140 t. logwood, Uhtoff & Co.
Dec. 7. Prussia @ New Orleans,—5,400 staves, Chaloner & Co. Steir @ Chiman,—6,000 c. logwood, G. B. Kerferd. Home @ Quebec,—1,637 deals, 103 deal ends, Order. N. A. Williams @ Cronstadt, —7,676 staves, 672 pcs. timber, Order. Great Britain @ Quebec,—3,683 deals, 1,111 deal ends, Order. Cyclone @ Miramichi,—11,402 deals, 2,812 pcs. scantlings, 1,444 deal ends, Farnworth & Co.
Dec. 8. Gracia (s) @ New Orleans,—196 planks, 60 ventilators, New York,—15 logs maple, 5,194 t. deals, 3,573 palings, Order.
Quebec,—940 pcs. timber, 40 std. deals, &c., C. H. Wright. Josefa @ Quebec,—616 pcs. timber, 1,939 deals, &c. St. George, N.B.,—19,628 pcs. scantlings, 4,822 boards, 1,638 staves. Mary E. Chapman @ New York,—4,800 staves, Order. Rutland @ New York,—2,812 pcs. treenails, Order. Pride of Canada @ New York,—1,200 pcs. treenails, C. H. Wright. Acme @ New York,—1,200 pcs. treenails, C. H. Wright.

There were also imported during the same period, 3,797 pcs. red-wood from Madras, and 27,800 staves from the United States.

HULL.
Nov. 25. Vaaren @ Wyburg,—9,016 pit props, Brown. Alpha @ Arendal,—1,047 pcs. timber, 6,130 props, 11 c. battens, &c., Ericsson. Blenda @ Gefle,—144 c. battens, &c., Bjufstrom. Hilma @ Hudiksvall,—88 c. battens, &c., Bjufstrom. Amelia @ Wyburg,—8,312 pit props, Paulsen. Andreas @ Mem,—57 c. deals, &c., Simony. Emanuel @ Arendal,—528 pcs. timber, 18 c. battens, Haagensen. Alma @ Bjorneborg,—246 c. deals, &c., Steweni. Agatha @ Quebec,—208 c. deals, &c., Steweni. Hero (s) @ Christiania,—78 cs., 190 bgs., 100 bls. wood pulp, 2,376 pit props, 144 c. deals, &c., Wilson. Hans @ Bureo,—88 c. deals, &c., Winter. Tama @ Mem,—100 c. deals, &c., Granberg. Pjaduwina @ Uleaborg,—30 c. deals, &c., Jensen.
Nov. 26. La Plata (s) @ Cronstadt,—2,110 pcs. lathwood, Bailey. Suez @ St. Lawrence,—101 c. deals, 16 c. ends, Steweni. Carl @ Soderhamn,—9 c. deals, 548 pcs. timber,—Winter. Bien @ Skutskar, —54 c. deals, &c., Voigt. Astarte (s) @ Cronstadt,—9 c. deals, &c., Hornstedt. Come On @ Gefle,—88 c. deals, &c., Bjufstrom.
Nov. 27. Hercules @ Quebec,—734 pcs. timber, 69 c. deals, 13 c. deal ends, Steweni. Louise @ Quebec,—206 c. deals, 27 deal ends, Steweni.
Nov. 28. Mohongo @ St. John, N.B.,—168 c. deals, &c., Steweni. Victoria @ St. John, N.B.,—91 c. deals, &c., 93 pcs. timber, Johnson.
Nov. 30. Britannia @ Quebec,—336 pcs. timber, 59 c. deals, 8 c. deal ends, 10 c. staves, Burstall.
Dec. 1. Bertha (s) @ St. John, N.B.,—112 c. deals, &c., 160 pcs. timber, 796 pcs. scantlings, 8,000 palings, Winter. Orlando (s) @ Gothenburg,—8,478 pit props, 74 c. battens, 214 bls. wood pulp, 100 doors, Wilson. Ango (s) @ Christiania,—355 pkgs. wood pulp, 2,771 pit props, 117 c. battens, Wilson. Skiddaw @ Cronstadt,—18 c. deals, &c., Briggs. Durham (s) @ Cronstadt,—875 pcs. lathwood, 34 c. deals, &c., Bailey. Dido (s) @ Trieste,—48,000 staves, Wilson.
Dec. 2. Joseph Somes (s) @ Cronstadt,—2,881 rickers, 1,590 pcs. lathwood, 7 c. deals, &c., Brown. Sylphide @ Cronstadt,—51 c. deals, &c., Brown. Tennessee @ Mem,—54 c. deals, &c., Lennard. Boas @ Chatham, N.B.,—145 bdls. palings, 89 c. deals, &c., 165 pcs. timber, 11 c. ends, Steweni. Poussin @ Cronstadt,—63 c. deals, &c., 200 pcs. lathwood, Haagensen.
Dec. 3. Adanir @ Nor @ Cronstadt,—89 c. deals, &c., Haagensen. Shields @ Jacobstadt,—2,654 pcs. timber, 880 pit props, 12 c. deals, &c., Wilson. C. H. Knitschy @ Riga,—30 wainscot logs, 25 fms. firewood, Wilson. Hidalgo @ Cronstadt,—89 c. deals, &c., Winter. Helena @ Umea,—61 c. deals, &c., Winter. Apollo (s) @ Cronstadt,—3,392 pcs. lathwood, Winter. Adventure @ Cronstadt,—186 c. deals, &c., Granberg.
Dec. 4. Mary @ Cronstadt,—114 c. deals, &c., Haagensen. Hiram @ Porsgrund,—5,047 pcs. timber, 26,240 staves, Voigt. Frederick @ Copenhagen,—5,673 staves, Leetham. Ingeborg @ Bjorneborg,—215 c. deals, &c., Steweni. Flirt @ Cronstadt,—46 c. deals, &c., —105 fms. lathwood, Winter. Copeland Isle @ Cronstadt,—78 c. deals, &c., Winter.
Dec. 5. Lucy @ Kothka,—74 c. deals, &c., Jenkins. Prince Albert @ Stockholm,—132 c. deals, &c., Briggs. Gallilei @ Riga,—836 logs, 9 c. deals, &c., Winter. El Dorado @ Quebec,—2,145 pcs. timber, 813 staves, 60 c. deals, Wilson. Magna @ Cronstadt,—133 c. deals, &c., Johnson. Kalaja @ Jacobstad,—180 c. deals, &c., Good. Carolina @ Sundswall,—437 pcs. timber, 151 c. boards, Steweni. William Bate-man @ Cronstadt,—79 c. deals, &c., Steweni.
Dec. 7. Anna @ Memel,—150 pcs. timber, 11,493 staves, Winter.
Dec. 8. Flora @ Quebec,—106 c. deals, 7 c. deal ends, 318 pcs. timber, Winter.
Dec. 9. Rolls (s) Gothenburg,—42 c. battens, 206 bls. wood pulp, 11,091 pit props, 5,0359 bdls. laths, Wilson.
There were also imported 1,000 pcs. lathwood from Cronstadt.

BRISTOL.
Nov. 26. Canova @ Quebec,—1,640 pcs. timber, 1,600 deals, 23 cords lathwood, Bayley & Co. Kate @ Miramichi,—15,672 deals, 3,090 pcs. scantlings, 1,313 deal ends, 4,652 palings, Taylor & Co. Familien @ Hudikswall,—32,885 boards, 128 poles, Taylor & Co. Concordia @ Dram,—38,231 boards, May & Co. Freden @ Archangel,—5,025 deals, 405 deals, Barnes & Sons. Falster @ Rafso,—15,615 deals, &c., Emblin & Co. Jones & Co. Idun @ Sundswall,—10,810 deals, &c., Jones & Co.
Nov. 30. Constantia @ Cronstadt,—9,006 deals, &c., May & Co.
